folder: City Island Avenue & Schofield Street, Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: City Island Avenue - Schofield Street
text:
232 City Island Ave. (City Island), at the S.E, corner of Schofield
Street (left, running towards background).
July 26, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

folder: Schofield Street & City Island Avenue, Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: Schofield Street - City Island Avenue
text:
Schofield Street (City Island), north side, between City Island Ave. and the east shore, showing Engine 70 of the New York Fire Department.
July 6, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
